transcript.title: Visit to Australia by the Queen and the Duke of Edinburgh
transcript.content:
As previously indicated, The Queen and The Duke of Edinburgh have accepted my invitation on behalf of the Government and people of Australia to visit Australia next year.

I can now confirm that the visit will take place in the second half of March 2000.

I am sure that The Queen and The Duke of Edinburgh will receive a warm welcome.

State and Territory Governments are being consulted in the preparation of the programme. Details will be announced at a later date.

6 August 1999
